name: ofbizextra
short_description:
OFBizextra is dedicated for all users/developpers of the Apache OFBiz solution which want to share some realisations (addons, tools, components).
This project would help to explain proposition/contribution to the Apache OFBiz community, because it's possible to show more easily a realisation and so receive more detailled reviews.
It's not to replace contribution process of Apache OFBiz but to share realization.

In this project there is a quality process (and so continuous integration tools) to help to have hight quality realization.
summary: addons, tools or components to extend Apache Ofbiz solution
